name: Mën-mëni jokkoo
description: Mën a déglu bu baax ñeneen ñi, ñaax nit ñi ñu waxtaan bu baax, mën a sàmm say gis-gis bu baax, mën a saafara ŋaayoo yi bu baax, ak wax ak kenn ku nekk ca na mu tollu.
questions: When was the last time you managed a conflict constructively?
Do you listen more or talk more? How hard would it be to change that balance?
How do you tailor your communication for different audiences?
